website_summaries.verdict: Unless you're the most devoted Dyson loyalist, you'll find much better values if you shop around -- including Dyson's own AM05.
pros: The Dyson AM09 Hot+Cool performed very well in our tests, and offers a distinctive, functional, feature-rich design
cons: Though very solid, the AM09 doesn't outperform much cheaper competitors by a wide enough margin to justify the price difference
If you misplace the remote, you'll be unable to access common controls like oscillation and the sleep timer

customer_reviews.title: Junk Science!
customer_reviews.text: Piece o... put it in a small room... 12 x 15... room was at 68 degrees... put it on highest setting of 99... ran it for 6 hours... room was than... 63 degrees... in other words... this does not work... it is a piece o _ _ _ _ !
customer_reviews.author: PM74

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: While the cost of this beast is hard to swallow for a lot of people, it has been a real work horse in our home. We initially bought it to further regulate the temperature in our newborns room while he slept and 18 months later he still uses it every night to keep him at the perfect temp. I like a cold house and that just isn't a sentiment shared by my wife. This fan with its hot and cold functions is the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Pensacola Micros

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I needed a heater for my kids rooms, it had to be safe, in every way. This is expensive yes, but I have touched it when it’s been running for hours and it’s “warm” to the touch. I can’t see this ever being dangerous or a fire hazard though I still am careful about using it. Great product and it really does warm up a room effectively! You can set a temperature and forget it. It’s quiet and has a nice sleek look to it.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: BETTER HEATERS OUT THERE.  TRY LASKO.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how it never heated up the room: 12 by 14. Fan Does not feel like it blows hot air, even at 90d. I tried it in different rooms. Just not hot enough for the PRICE. I had High Expectations: I IGNORED the Bad Reviews. Now I know what they are talking about.
customer_reviews.author: JOVENTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know it was an Open Box.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a brand new unit for which I paid full price. Upon opening the box, the unit had obviously been a returned item. The only thing wrapped was the magnetic base plate. The remote control was loose in the bottom of the box and the power cord was just loosely wrapped around the body. It works with not damage but I am unsure whether I will keep it as I do not know why it was returned from the original purchaser.
customer_reviews.author: Blackripleydog

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small loft in Atlanta, and this is perfect for those mornings in the bathroom bathing and doing my hair to keep a little warmer in the winter; and a real godsend in the summer to keep the room cool while blow drying my hair. It is very user friendly and quiet. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dale G.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy xxx
customer_reviews.text: Although, its a great heater but no way its any cooler, just like it said on the product discription. Down right false advertisement! Do not buy ! with that same money you can buy 3 space heaters with better qualities!..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dyson won't honor warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Our heater worked great for about 18 months. Now it works for about 30 seconds before it displays an error code and starts blowing cold air. The only way to turn it off is to unplug it. Since we purchased our heater from an unauthorized seller on Amazon, Dyson won't honor our warranty. I didn't realize this would be the case and I'm disappointed because we have a lot of Dyson products. Just posting this so you don't make the same mistake I did by purchasing from an unauthorized seller.
customer_reviews.author: Farin Yancich

customer_reviews.title: Works OK but was obviously returned by a previous customer
customer_reviews.text: My new Dyson fan came in an Amazon box that look like it had been through a tornado. I was very concerned that the fan would not work properly. When I opened the outside box, the Dyson box was just a little crumbled. When I opened the Dyson box, it was obvious that this product has been returned by someone else. I skeptically assembled it and turned it on. It appears to work fine so I’m not sure why it was returned. I think I will hold onto the Dyson box a little while longer, just in case. My purchase did not indicate that this was a reconditioned or used product. For the price it should be wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P. Darcy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from Dyson. I am within the two year warranty however they are claiming I am two months outside the two year warranty. In any event, the unit has died and the support team has told me to go buy a new one. It is extremely disappointing that Dyson will not stand behind its product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelloggcat

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater, Horrible Fan/Cooler
customer_reviews.text: The reason this is getting a 2 star is because of the price and the terrible cooling/fan feature. Even when it is on full power it does a horrible job as a fan and is very weak. And DySoN customer service sucks. The Pros: if you use this for a heater only than it is great. The heater was amazing and worked very well, it was also very energy efficient, it didn’t effect our bill much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Hoarder

customer_reviews.title: Finally warmth!
customer_reviews.text: We went through so many lasko and vornado brands before I gave in and just got the dyson. I figured what the heck if we hate it it's just another return. Well we love it. With the others it never got temperature control right. The room would be freezing or just too hot. This one you set 70 and it sets for up to 9 hours and warms up beautifully. We decided against the new one with the air purifier because of the reviews and we already have an air purifier. We haven't tried the cooling because its January but looking forward to continuing the heat with this one. Thanks Dyson for making beautiful products.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: There are better out there , Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Weak came damaged & Amazon giving a real hard time to return it
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Balboa

customer_reviews.title: WHY DIDN’T I BUY THIS LONG AGO
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am absolutely in love with this. You know when you are comfy in bed and realize the fan isn’t on, or it isn’t pointing in the direction you want, but you don’t want to get out of bed??? WELL DAMN, the remote eases this silly burden. There’s control setting 1-10 for the cool air, and you can adjust the temperature for the heater. YES, a fan AND a heater IN 1. It’s a bit pricey, but I don’t mind it. It’s easy to clean, it’s a 2in1, and it has a sleep design. Can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: good reliable heater
customer_reviews.text: I am only using this as a heater I have no way of knowing how energy efficient it is. I would assume it is much more efficient than our last heater. The only thing I don't like is that when it gets up to temperature it seems to blow cold air when it is supposed to just shut off. I think it is just our unit because our daughter has the same model and hers works as advertised. other than that I am very happy with the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Aube

customer_reviews.title: Fan is not QUIET
customer_reviews.text: I purchased fan because I need something cool and quiet at night. It's cool but not quiet. It has to be on a speed of 4 to be absolutely quiet. Speed of 4 doesn't put out enough air. I was going to return to Triplenet Pricing INC. However, they want to deduct the cost to ship to me, I have to pay to ship it back, & restocking fee. I decided to keep it and make use of it somehow instead of losing money. Beware when purchasing items that are not shipped by Amazon and especially from TRIPLENET PRICING INC. Since purchasing through Amazon I assumed I was getting Amazon return agreement.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: High quality warmer
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our daughter's room and it works perfectly. Pros: not hot to the touch whatsoever warms the entire room quiet Cons: Nothing really negative to say about this at all other than I hope I don't lose the remote, as it's the only way to control the product. I highly recommend this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love this A/C and heater unit!!
customer_reviews.text: I was at first worried because there were reviews that said this product was not new. Although mine also came in a beat up box, it had all the normal cushions and plastic wrappings. This unit is pretty quiet and warms my 400 sq foot room efficiently. Have not notice a significant uptick on my electricity bill so I do not think it sucks out too much power. Have yet to use the A/C function yet because it has been pretty cool but heater is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Better heater than fan but ultimately worth it.
customer_reviews.text: When I lived in the Midwest in an old apartment, my Dyson was a lifesaver. The price is jarring at first (I took one star off for the price) but ultimately worth it. I bought a couple of cheaper space heaters ($40-$50) but they conked out after 4-5uses. It works better in an enclosed room and the heating function is definitely the stronger function. I’ve had mine for 3 years and it’s still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Pellegrino920

customer_reviews.title: Nice Even On Hot Days!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to buy this, being so pricey, but I needed something for my room that will be safe for a toddler also. The fan doesn’t seem like it would cool down much, but I’ve found myself waking up during a hot summer night, and having to turn the fan down because I was so cold. The heater aspect of it is very nice also. The one that I used to have blew very hot air out, which scared me with my toddler. This Dyson blows out nice warm air that evenly heats the room. The remote for it is very nice, and easy to figure out! Overall, I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fan isn’t functional after 4 months...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my product isn’t functional anymore (after 4 months only..) - Few weeks ago the Oscillation stopped working (not responding - It was always “On”) - Yesterday the Appliance itself stopped working (causing power outage for the entire house when I plug in to the socket) I So far I didn’t get any support from Dyson..
customer_reviews.author: eliran

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in the winter, have only used this for heating so far. Works really well to warm up a bedroom or office space. Easy to move and relocate when you want to use it in another room. Very quiet, to the point that I almost couldn't tell it was running until I looked at the front display and then felt the warm air output. Remote control is pretty slick, and magnetically attaches to the top of the fan. Looking forward to seeing how well this works to keep down temps in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Babonas

customer_reviews.title: Cool, Lovely, and Child-Safe!
customer_reviews.text: This fan has been a lifesaver in the summer heat! It's powerful enough to keep me cool at night and quiet enough not to keep me awake. I like the bladeless design so it's safe around kids (and adults!), and the remote has been really convenient to use from bed. I love the color and finish - feels well made and it's very aesthetically pleasing!
customer_reviews.author: lalicorne

customer_reviews.title: Better than Buying a $10,000 Mini-Split!
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the expense. Using one in a 1700 sqft insulated pole barn in Southwest Washington State, and it actually keeps the temp at 50 in winter and quickly brings the temp up. It's very lightweight, easy to move around. I was surprised by how much air flow it generates. Nice touch to have the remote magnetically attach to the unit. I've tried 3 other heaters in this area and this is the only one that did the job without excessive electrical charges.
customer_reviews.author: Harry and Sally

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in the living room and use it when we prefer not to heat the whole house, usually early or late when one of us is in bed. The heat is warm air blowing either straight at you or oscillating about 90 degrees. It’s perfect for us. The thermostat turns off all functions when the temp has been reached and will resume when temp falls below. The remote works well. Takes the chill off my chilly feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kingdombeliever

customer_reviews.title: (Nearly) Best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.text: As a cooling fan it gets 3 stars as the strength and the breadth of the output is not at the price level. However it heating function is 5 stars so balance them out to 4 overall. We use this unit to keep our master suite including the bathroom at a more comfortable temp first thing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: KCASEY

customer_reviews.title: Not for a huge area
customer_reviews.text: Well it was hard to leave a review for this product because I only kept for a day it only took a couple of hours for me to realize it wasn't going to work for the area I needed it for which is about 1000 square feet. I need emediate heat and Dyson heater was not going to provide that it had been on for two hours and it was comfortable but not warming up the area like the previous heating I was using.
customer_reviews.author: urshurt

customer_reviews.title: Damaged frame. Definitely an used item.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed to see these dents and scratches when opening the box. Returning and ordered from Dyson.com directly. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: songhao

customer_reviews.title: It’s the APPLE of fans/heaters!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, doesn’t require a lot of desk/counter/table space, easy to operate. Heats & Cools quickly. Not loud as fans with blades. Easy to clean with just a damp cloth- takes seconds. Temperature control is great - device knows the ambient temperature of your space and is pretty accurate. I’m gonna get another once I pay this off!
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Received broken fan
customer_reviews.text: Just started setting fan up for family visiting at Christmas. Although the box/packaging appeared fine, the fan itself is badly cracked along on the top and down the front. Looks like someone repacked a broken fan! Tough luck for me that the period of return has lapsed.
customer_reviews.author: echo

customer_reviews.title: Good for It's Dual Purpose
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson fans are excellent. This doesn't blow the amount of air that the taller fan-only unit does, but it does tilt upward which helps. We wanted the heating function for use in our sunroom in the winter. So, this a good choice if dual functioning is desired.
customer_reviews.author: NightTrain

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: We moved into an older house in February 2019, temps outside were frigid. The master bathroom must have no insulation. The floors were like ice, and it was torture to shower in there. I ordered this fine little heater/cooler and it actually warmed the bathroom and now using the cool fan setting in there this summer. It's a huge bathroom, about 15 x 15 floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Butler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Of course, no one wants to spend this much money on a fan! But it’s worth every penny. Heats up a large room quickly. Cools it off quickly. It’s pretty quiet although we like the noise at night but have adjusted to it’s quietness.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Kindblade

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this fan. Finally a personal space heater I don't have to worry about it falling over or catching things on fire. Such a soothing comfortable warm. The cooling fan works very well to. I'm so pleased with this fan, it's absolutely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: BastetMau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - for a small room
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you would expect from Dyson. Sleek, stylish, very functional. But keep in mind that this is not intended to be used for a large room. I have this in my office, roughly the size of an average size bedroom. It can raise the temperature and maintain it well, but it would not be effective in a room much bigger than this.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Goryunov

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the Cold Room in the House
customer_reviews.text: We tried a lot of options to fix the "cold" room we had in the house. My daughters room is always 6-8 degrees colder in the winter and hotter in the summer. So far (about a month into use) this has dramatically fixed the problem. It was much more cost effective than other smart vents and other dampener systems we looked at, very quiet and shuts off when it hits the desired temperature. We'll have to wait until summer to test how well it cools down the room, but we're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price but it isn't bad
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. I've used both the cold and warm air function. Both are adequate. But it could use some work. Perhaps the thermostat built in is off, or at least mine isnt accurate. Other than that, and a few design improvements to make it stronger. As it seems it will break soon.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good product but with strong noise
customer_reviews.text: Dyson is great brand, now we get chance to use it during summer. everything is fine but when summer start, we are using cooling featuer, it is really loud, which bring lots of noise. I just put on level 6, it already loud enough. not really good idea for kids sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Buster

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works well. We have a large recreation room and needed something extra for heat after our electric fireplace heater gave out. It is neat nice looking and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Topgun

customer_reviews.title: Circulates Lukewarm Air
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the heating function. It basically circulates lukewarm air without the ability to actually heat a room. Extremely overpriced for the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Efficient Dyson Fan
customer_reviews.text: I Love how Quiet this fan is & the air is like velvet. My husband & I take showers at night, we live in a 4 Season Rocky Mountain Town & we supplement our heat in our bathroom at night or morning. I bought this to replace a tall fan that worked well for years however I disliked all the beeping sounds & it was getting worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Lois H.

customer_reviews.title: This fan heater got our cold room nice and warm in no time
customer_reviews.text: This fan heater got our cold room nice and warm in no time. Like how it also cools when temperature gets too hot (e.g from multiple people in the room). And best of all, it's safe for children, as there are no awkward heating elements where your child could burn itself on.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Allows us to sleep knowing our infant son is nice and warm in the winter.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do very well overall. We purchased this to provide a more stable temperature in winter weather for our infant son’s room than our wall heater can provide. It hasn’t disappointed and my wife and I sleep much better not worrying about whether he is too hot or too cold. The only thing we don’t like about it is that the fan is a bit too noisy above level 4 (with the narrow air stream) and just noisy in general with the wide air stream. This limits how high we can set the level while our son is sleeping. This is really nitpicking though. Overall this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended warranty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. Very quiet and the remote is very handy. 4 stars because this is my second unit. The first died about a month past the warranty. Have bought a total of three Dyson vacuums and two of the three had to be repaired under warranty. Great products when they work but far from bullet proof.
customer_reviews.author: Craig V

customer_reviews.title: Life safer in child's room
customer_reviews.text: This heater is amazing! We are using it in our toddlers room, which happens to be the coldest room in the house! He sleeps through the night again and his room stays a staedy temperature due to the thermostat setting! would highly recommend also for a nursery this is a very safe product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great...
customer_reviews.text: What I like most - It works fantastic. Of course, the least like is the cost. However, you normally get what you pay for. We have Dyson vacuums and are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest R.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loud, does not get as cold as they advertise. It is a fan, does not have freon.
customer_reviews.author: aucelegre

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Missing the user manual and looks like opened box.The battery cannot changing.
customer_reviews.author: shi can wu

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We have a three season porch and depending on the time of year we often would like it cooler or warmer! This Dyson product takes care of both problems and is so attractive also! We have young grandchildren so no worries about getting to close to the fan!
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Sakstrup

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Boo. It's October and I turned on the heater after 5 months if non use. It no longer oscillates and the intensity is at 25% less. It's not even cold yet! Total waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: cdpettit

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: The wind strength is too weak. The size is too small. It would be nice to put it in the baby room. Recommended for babies. Adult rooms are not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ye jin JEONG

customer_reviews.title: always trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: This brand that we always trusted and been loyal for many years already. This fan price a very reasonable compare to official site. Worth for money. But, the seller named No TAX is not ture...:)
customer_reviews.author: ming liu

customer_reviews.title: air quality improvement and thermostat make this baby one of the best. I hear the filters are expensive but a ...
customer_reviews.text: It would be expensive if it were just a heater but the quiet, air quality improvement and thermostat make this baby one of the best. I hear the filters are expensive but a once a year expense is worth the clean air.
customer_reviews.author: 1WorldWayne

customer_reviews.title: Poor value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The fan clicks at the end of each turn (oscillation), and it isn't nearly as quiet as they made it seem. I should have just bought the off brand and saved the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Costly to run
customer_reviews.text: Great device, jacked our heating bill by $200 by keeping it on overnight
customer_reviews.author: jbm

customer_reviews.title: The perfect heater for my living room
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleek design and it is so quiet! Based on room temperature it turns on/off automatically to adjust the heat so that the room feels warm but not too hot. This is the perfect heater I need for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krishnamurthi

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan Heater!
customer_reviews.text: This is pricy but well worth it. It is little but does a big job. It cools in the summer and warms in the winter. My only complaint is there was no book with it, we had to figure it out by trial & error. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: JGram

customer_reviews.title: Display and remote faulty
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses display does not work, remote does not function properly, and neither does the timer function.
customer_reviews.author: Lysette Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition for my apt
customer_reviews.text: Like that I can set this heater on my dresser or on the floor. I have to remind myself to unplug after I turn it off...but I'm trying to get in the habit of doing that with all appliances.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works just fine! The warm fan is powerful, a little noisier than expected but Once you get used to it, i barely notice!
customer_reviews.author: LLBr

customer_reviews.title: I love , love , love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is exceptional, The fan cools well and the heating feature keeps the area nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: SoFloFoodie

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Well worked for a week now it throws an H2 error code and I read a forum where its widespread dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Heater and Fan
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Sleek design, does everything I want it to. And it looks pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!
customer_reviews.text: Best heater and cool fan I’ve ever owned. We liked so much we bought a second.
customer_reviews.author: Mary In VA

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This a great little heater. Heats up 500 square feet space without problems. It's not instantaneous and probably reason for poor reviews here. very happy with purchase...classic you get what you pay for...nice looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Small, beautiful, and safe.
customer_reviews.text: Small and beautiful appearance. Suitable for the small room to heat. Still a bit of noise. Safe for children.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great
customer_reviews.text: Great heater, the heating is the most even I have ever had. Truly a great product and very worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mlw290

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: How long before the awful hot plastic smell abates from this fan??? Other than the smell, I like this product, and it was delivered when you said it would be. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Tuller Jan Merrifield

customer_reviews.title: loud not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Loud and couldn't feel the air!!! So disappointed I have always wanted one of these but honestly our big square bulky black one is way quiter and colder. Returning immediately! Would not recommend 😕
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. We use it indoors and outdoors for cooling and look forward to winter for heating. It is quiet, efficient, and maintains room temperature in the room. Easily portable and can be moved from room to room. Many features to choose from to direct the air. Will probably buy more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice. Enjoy all the features
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice. Enjoy all the features. A great way to instantly head a small area. Very quiet at low velocity settings. Most expensive area heater I have ever bought, but glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Dyson fan and heater
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get one with the air purifier. I have allergies so it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dedeaux

customer_reviews.title: Took me back to the 90’s, just like my Pentium I processor 😁
customer_reviews.text: The price is absolutely ridiculous; the product design isn't bad. Its safe for the kids but the functionality could be slightly better. It takes forever to use the remote and turn on the air or switch from hot to cold.
customer_reviews.author: Farrukh Ashfaq

customer_reviews.title: Awesome small appliance
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan heater: it keeps temperature in any room stable with minimal noise. Used it primary in bedrooms overnight.
customer_reviews.author: apprieto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect though i thought it be a little bigger !
customer_reviews.text: Really like it ,it does a good job distributing the heat in the room .
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Sent remote with a dead battery
customer_reviews.text: It heats and cools nicely but they sent the remote with a dead battery and had to go buy a new battery to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Aletheia

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best used product- l’ve bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Top quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome product!! Best quality, looks great and best of all I don’t need to worry my baby will touch and get burned. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Moreen D.

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for a fan that heats and cools as needed during Summer and Winter
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Now I have 2 of them. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I've been having it in my home office during summer and now winter months and I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: L. Cojocaru/M. Anca

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived missing base and not operative
customer_reviews.text: Item doesn't work. Arrived missing base piece. Took 10 days to arrrive
customer_reviews.author: kathleen bescoby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but what the unit I received is defective
customer_reviews.text: The design from Dyson is really good, including the way to mount your remote. It provides good feeling on the heater part, which fulfill my requirement for now. However, what I received is a defected unit, on which I am deep disappointment. Do not recommend to buy from this seller "SuperClean Store (We Record S/N)".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever

customer_reviews.title: That this item DOESN’T WORK OUTSIDE THE USA !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a disgrace. I bought this item without being told that the energy is different here in Portugal. I cannot send it back as you don’t allow this and there is NO way that this can work here as a transformer is out of the question!!! Money throwed to the bin!!!!

customer_reviews.text: Loud enough if you like white noise while sleeping. And both the fan and heater work well.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. We started using this in our bedroom in the winter and it keeps the heat perfectly stable. We save a few $100 off of our heat bill - this has been a great ‘investment’!

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Provides a lot of warmth
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Provides a lot of warmth. Easy to use. I read about a recall for safety reasons regarding an earlier version and hope this doesn't have the same problem. It's expensive but it puts out more heat than a normal space heater and also has a nice fan with no heat. It's stylish too!

customer_reviews.title: Quiet.. good to have for emergency.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used fan part feature. Only used heat so far. Warms up a 10x15 room preety well in 2 hrs with door shut.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Shower effective. Works great as the primary heat source in California winter.
customer_reviews.author: ardra singh

customer_reviews.title: Impressive fan/heater!
customer_reviews.text: This AM09 fan/heater is a replacement for one that had issues with its power supply. This one functions fine. Some key features are: -quiet, oscillats, magnetic, ease of use, onboard remote cradle, small footprint, impressive aesthetics. choice of colors (mine is black and nickel)
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This heater is a lifesaver and worth every penny. Thank you dyson for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Pontino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the AM09 Fan Heater in November 2015 for use as a heater in the lower entry way and adjoining laundry room of my home. I had been using a space heater in each area to keep the chill away and wanted to replace each with something more energy efficient. I have had a Dyson vacuum for years that I absolutely love and decided to give the AM09 a try. It serviced both areas quite well and contributed to lower electric costs. I am using it this summer in the same areas as a fan to keep the air moving. It's quiet, energy efficient, has a great space saving design and can be used year round - it's terriffic!
customer_reviews.author: Carole C.

product_meta.title: Dyson (61874-01) Hot + Cool Jet Focus AM09 Fan Heater White/Silver
product_meta.description: Color:White/Silver| Design:FanFast, even room heating paired with powerful personal cooling makes Dyson’s AM09 fan heater effective all year round. Through Dyson’s Air Multiplier patented technology, the AM09 fan heater creates a powerful stream of uninterrupted airflow into the room for either jet focused, powerful airflow or diffused, wide projected airflow to mix the surrounding air. The precise, energy efficient fan heater is awarded the quiet mark accreditation and has features including sleep timer, oscillation control, no fast-spinning blades for little fingers or paws and has a curved, magnetized remote control to store neatly on the machine. Temperature setting is 33 to 99 degree precision.
feature_bullets: Year-round use: quickly heats the whole room in winter with a powerful fan to cool you in summer
Patented Air Multiplier technology effectively projects heating or cooling into the room quickly and evenly for a comfortable environment
Intelligent thermostat monitors the room to reach and maintain your selected temperature in heat mode so there is no wasted energy

Safety: this fan heater has no exposed heating elements so there is no burning smell, no fast spinning blades for small fingers and paws, and if the machine is tipped over, it will automatically shut off

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars932 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
